item.title: Reducing Hospital Readmissions From Nursing Facilities
item.description: A lack of coordinated care often contributes to the 20%-25% of hospital readmissions. Medscape Medical News

item.title: The 90-Day Loop: Preventing Readmissions in Diabetes Care
item.description: It takes a complete team performance to help patients with diabetes avoid readmission after discharge. Medscape Medical News
